nodes.text: The Platform 6 cantina was a cantina located on Platform 6 in the Old World of Zakuul that was owned by the Wookiee Bowdaar in the aftermath of the Eternal Empire conquest. In 3631 BBY Senya Tirall arranged a meeting with Reg in the cantina, but was ambushed by Aitan Brewgs and the Heralds of Zildrog instead.
The Platform 6 cantina appears as an area on Zakuul in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire expansion.
